case_2.name: Update Email
case_2.expected_confirm_email: You have requested a change of email address, from student@moodle.a to thnhut.shd231@hcmut.edu.vn. For security reasons, we are sending you an email message at the new address to confirm that it belongs to you. Your email address will be updated as soon as you open the URL sent to you in that message.
case_2.expected_value_email: Change pending. Open the link sent to you at thnhut.shd231@hcmut.edu.vn.
